content.en: Robotic welding advancements: Researchers are exploring the use of various algorithms and technologies to improve seam locating and tracking in robotic welding. These include circular laser-based vision sensors, real-time image processing, computer vision technology, modified Hough algorithms, structured-light vision, striped line laser sensors, visual target tracking, vision sensors and image processing, active laser vision, structured-light sensors, laser vision sensors, improved image processing approaches, laser visual sensors, and IPCE algorithms. These algorithms and technologies aim to develop faster, more precise, and robust methods for identifying and tracking weld seams in different welding processes.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for robot-svejsning: Forskere undersøger brugen af forskellige algoritmer og teknologier for at forbedre sømfindelse og sporing i robotsvejsning. Disse inkluderer cirkulære laserbaserede visionssensorer, realtids-billedbehandling, computer vision-teknologi, modificerede Hough-algoritmer, struktureret lys-vision, stribede linjelasersensorer, visuel målsøgning, visionssensorer og billedbehandling, aktiv laservision, strukturerede lys-sensorer, laservisionssensorer, forbedrede billedbehandlingsmetoder, laser-visionssensorer og IPCE-algoritmer. Disse algoritmer og teknologier sigter mod at udvikle hurtigere, mere præcise og robuste metoder til at identificere og spore svejsesømme i forskellige svejseprocesser.
